title: OnePlus has rolled out the March security patch to these phones
content:
OnePlus promises to deliver regular system updates for its wide array of smartphones for at least two years and in some cases much longer for flagship models, but how is the March 2022 security update being handled?

The post OnePlus has rolled out the March security patch to these phones appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus is rolling out the March 2022 security update to some of its smartphones, though the rollout started nearly 14 days late.
